scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && tsc && shx cp -r public dist/ && shx chmod +x dist/src/*.js
scripts.start: npm run build && npx dotenv -e .env -- npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node dist/src/index.js
scripts.start:server: npm run build && concurrently "npx dotenv -e .env -- node dist/src/index_server.js" "DANGEROUSLY_OMIT_AUTH=true npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector"
scripts.start:server-local: npm run build && concurrently "npx dotenv -e .env -- node dist/src/index_server_local.js" "DANGEROUSLY_OMIT_AUTH=true npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector"
